name: Wipe Girls 0
description:
"Wipe Girl 0" is a simple and relaxing wiping game. By wiping the black screen on the picture, you can unlock several small stories about four female protagonists. They each have their own characteristics and hobbies, and have unique relationships with you.

Yuiko
I've never been willing to go to my friend's house to play because her older sister is always too laid-back and friendly. I hope I can come back unharmed this time.

Chizuru
Even though I've been living with my girlfriend for a while, I still feel happy when I see her wiping the breakfast table for me in the morning.

Maki
Sometimes, I can't help but feel that the gentle and modest mother-in-law is more charming than my barbaric girlfriend.

Iroha
I went on a trip to the nearby mountains and forests with my ambiguous junior, and seeing her wiping her forehead with a cool-looking handkerchief, I always feel that something unexpected might happen today.
